---
title: "webpage layout"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(shiny)
install.packages("shinydashboard")
library(shinydashboard)
```
```{r}
dashboardPage(
  dashboardHeader(),
  dashboardSidebar(),
  dashboardBody())

ui <- dashboardPage(
  
      dashboardHeader(title = "Oral Health Trends"),
  
      dashboardSidebar( 
        sidebarMenu(
          menuItem("Home", tabName = "Home", icon = icon("Home")),
          menuItem("Age 18+", tabName = "age18", icon = icon("Age 18+")))),
  
      dashboardBody(
        tabItems(
          tabItem(tabName = "Home",
            fluidRow(
              box(titlePanel("Welcome to our page!")),
              box(mainPanel("info about our page and why its important")))),
        
          tabItem(tabName = "age18",
              titlePanel("Adults aged 18+ who have visited a dentist or dental clinic in the past year")))))

server <- function(input, output) { }

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
